attributes.action: not let humans decide for others without their involvement
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Power people can't cope with the thoughts of all the others for whom they assume the role to make decisions. Computer based, number crunching, of predicate calculus of the arguments - call it e-Government - should help. The switch in parallel computing is a good analogy for the bottleneck humans represent in this system. Political lecturers to lead debates is the limit of centralized human positions permissible in logic.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
